project_abstract.cdata: The project's major objectives are: (a) to raise agricultural production, incomes, and employment levels in Erzurum province; and (b) to improve conditions of rural life. These objectives will be achieved by: (i) establishment of an intensive multi-disciplinary extension service; (ii) development and demonstration of technical packages for cereals and forage crops, including improved pasture and range management practices; (iii) extension of irrigation facilities and soil conservation; (iv) provision of credit for production and investment, including beekeeping operations, 3 honeypackaging and marketing units, improvement of 3 existing milk collection centers and establishment of 7 new ones.
